members.name: Mayer Amschel Rothschild
members.bio: Founder of the Rothschild banking dynasty. Started as a dealer of rare coins in Frankfurt.

members.name: Gutle Schnapper
members.bio: Wife of Mayer Amschel Rothschild and matriarch of the Rothschild family.

members.name: Amschel Mayer Rothschild
members.bio: Head of the Frankfurt House, continuing his father's banking business in Germany.

members.name: Salomon Mayer Rothschild
members.bio: Founder of the Vienna House, expanding Rothschild banking into the Austrian Empire.

members.name: Nathan Mayer Rothschild
members.bio: Founder of the London House, the most successful of the Rothschild branches.

members.name: Kalmann (Carl) Mayer Rothschild
members.bio: Founder of the Naples House, managing banking operations in Italy.

members.name: Jakob (James) Mayer Rothschild
members.bio: Founder of the Paris House, establishing the Rothschild banking presence in France.

members.name: Hannah Barent Cohen
members.bio: Wife of Nathan Rothschild, helped establish the family in British society.

members.name: Lionel de Rothschild
members.bio: First Jewish Member of Parliament in Britain, taking the seat for the City of London in 1858.
